thread.title: Hailey Baldwin wears modest black bathing suit in Hawaii
thread.title_full: Hailey Baldwin wears modest black bathing suit in Hawaii | Daily Mail Online

author: dailymail.co.uk
title: Hailey Baldwin wears modest black bathing suit in Hawaii
text:
Hailey Baldwin sent temperatures soaring during a winter getaway to Oahu, Hawaii on Friday.
The model was spotted splashing in the surf as she wore a stylish yet modest black bathing suit that left little to the imagination while flashing her upper thigh tattoo.
Hailey, 20, looked carefree as she soaked up the sun and enjoyed a work break with Hillsong pastor Carl Lentz and his wife, Laura Lentz.
Life's a beach! Hailey Baldwin sent temperatures soaring during a winter getaway to Oahu, Hawaii on Friday
Hailey's black bathing suit clung to her pert posterior and showed off her long, toned legs to full effect.
She had her hair first scraped back up into a neat little bun, before letting it down as she submerged herself into the water.
Testing out the waters, Hailey first cautiously approached the ocean blue.
But it didn't take long for the star to take a dip, submerging herself under water.
Dropping jaws: Hailey's black bathing suit clung to her pert posterior and showed off her long, toned legs to full effect
Keep it chic on the beach in Hailey Baldwin's Matteau swimsuit £193 Matteau The Square swimsuit
Get it at MATCHESFASHION.COM
Buy now
Whilst it may be jumper weather in the UK, over in Hawaii it's all about the sun, sea and swimwear!
Lucky Hailey Baldwin was spotted there on Friday soaking up the rays as she paddled in the sea wearing a chic black one-piece.
A swimsuit is both a flattering and classy alternative to a bikini and this one with its square neckline is the ultimate in timeless swimwear.
It's by Matteau and is available to buy online now at MATCHESFASHION.COM, simply follow the link on the right to snap it up now!
Or if you'd rather shop around check out our edit of alternatives in the carousel below, with picks from Adriana Degreas, Gottex, Esprit and Melissa Odabash.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £236 Adriana Degreas square neckline swimsuit at Farfetch
Buy now

Buy now
£30 Esprit Sporty swimsuit with a tone-in-tone logo
Buy now
£200 Melissa Odabash Milano One Piece at Simply Beach
Buy now
Tatt's enough! Baldwin's bathing suit flashed her upper thigh tattoo
Paradise: Baldwin gazed towards the ocean as she walked barefoot on the beach
Strolling barefoot across the sand, Hailey was the picture of relaxation as she enjoyed some well-deserved R&R.
After getting in some sun and surf, Hailey headed back to the family's car, rocking a white baseball hat and pink tint sunglasses.
Hailey has been in Hawaii these last few days celebrating a pal's wedding.
Beach babe! The model was bound to turn heads during her day of fun and relaxation
Making a splash! The star ran her hands through her hair after taking a dip
The nuptials were between her ex Justin Bieber's best friend, photographer Joe Termini and Kelia Moniz in Honolulu.
Hailey was no doubt pleased to spend the weekend letting loose with friends following the news that her father Stephen Baldwin is set to lose his house.
A foreclosure auction is officially set for March 16 at Rockland County Courthouse, according to court documents obtained by DailyMail.com, with the actor's New York home is planned to be sold off to the highest bidder.
Hat's off to her! The catwalk queen left the beach wearing a white hat
Fun with friends: Baldwin couldn't have looked happier as she strolled on the surf beside a pal
Hair today: After undoing her top knot, Hailey submerged herself into the water
Back in 2013, Deutsche Bank filed a foreclosure lawsuit against Stephen and his wife, Kennya, accusing them of defaulting on their loan by failing to make payments.
Stephen, 50, had originally taken out an $812,500 loan to purchase the four-bedroom, four-bathroom, 3,071 square-foot house in Upper Grandview in 2000. The couple were to pay nearly $7,000 a month on the mortgage.
He stopped paying his mortgage in 2011, however, and at the time of the filing, he owed almost $800,000 on the loan, according to Deutsche Bank.
Whoa, there! Testing out the waters, Hailey first cautiously approached the ocean blue
Hitting the road: Baldwin returned to the car with several belongings
Not a hair out of place! The star fussed around with her bun, doing it as she hit the water
Last year, the bank demanded the case move forward, even after Stephen blew off the lawsuit completely. The bank pleaded for the green light to begin the foreclosure process and to force the actor to pay his current debt owed on the mortgage, which had snowballed into a whopping $1.1 million - plus interest.
The star finally headed to court, hoping to have the entire foreclosure lawsuit thrown out and save the property from being sold at auction.
Meanwhile, Hailey may be a rising star in the modelling world with an international career to boot, but the beauty finds the large amount of travelling a little lonely sometimes.
'It's tough sometimes, the thing I've been struggling with the most is I miss my family,' she told Glamour magazine last year.
'I think about my parents and I'm like, "Wow I really haven't seen them in a long time". Things get pretty lonely, I'm not going to lie, some of the most famous people you'll see are truly some of the most lonely. It's very sad.'
Toned and terrific! Dipping her toes in the water, Baldwin no doubt turned heads during her beach excursion
Life's good! The star was clearly in relaxed spirits
